JUPGF.summary: Jupiter Gold Corporation engages in the exploration and development of gold and precious metals mining opportunities in Brazil. It also explores for palladium, platinum, iron, and manganese ores. The company has 100% ownership to eight gold projects in development and exploratory stages totaling 154,000 acres, and an active mineral right for iron and manganese with 233 acres. Jupiter Gold Corporation was founded in 2016 and is based in Olhos-d`Ãgua, Brazil.
